Name: Listen Me
About the game: ‘Listen Me’ is a 4-players cooperative online puzzle game. In ‘Listen Me’ everyone must work together and solve all puzzles to win the prize for restarting their life, but solving puzzles isn’t easy there is times and mistakes limit. Communicating is the core of this game, 1 player will be given the role of Operator who will be observing and helping 3 other players. Those players will be in their separate rooms. So, let’s communicate, solve all puzzles, and get the prize! Story 4 unemployed people entered to play in some mysterious puzzle machine, they must communicate, solve puzzles and get the prize to restart their life! Feature Online Multiplayer In this game, all players must work together to solve the puzzle. If anyone loses, everyone loses. Voice Chat We have Voice Chat system for players to communicate and exchange their thought for the best experience possible. Challenging Experience There are some obstacles, in every puzzle your time limit will get reduced if you and your team not doing anything to the obstacle. But! If any puzzle gets solved you will get extra time! We also have an optional mini game, if you play it you’ll get extra time. So please manage your time properly! Ranking All ranks in this game have the same condition. You’ll get a rank from clearing the game in each round. Getting a high rank isn’t an easy task, it relies on everyone. Let’s try solving puzzles and clear the game as fast as possible!
